sn45.30:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā uttiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā uttiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.30:1.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn45.30:1.5: Katame nu kho pañca kāmaguṇā vuttā bhagavatā’”ti?
sn45.30:1.7: Pañcime kho, uttiya, kāmaguṇā vuttā mayā.
sn45.30:1.9: Cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
sn45.30:1.13: kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā—
sn45.30:1.14: ime kho, uttiya, pañca kāmaguṇā vuttā mayā.
sn45.30:1.15: Imesaṃ kho, uttiya, pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ pahānāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo.
sn45.30:1.18: Imesaṃ kho, uttiya, pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ pahānāya ayaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvetabbo”ti.
